name: Armed and Leggy
description:
Armed and Leggy is a puzzle-solving game where you and your partner play as the upper half and lower half of a robot being researched in a science laboratory. The scientists have prepared a set of tests for the two of you to solve.

Credits

Programming - Ron Sison

Art Assets -Matthew Ramos

Game Idea, Background Art, UI - Josef Escarcha

Tile Palette - https://creazilla.com/nodes/1556276-free-scifi-platform-vector

Music - HeatleyBros

"8 Bit Journey" by HeatleyBros -

"8 Bit Think" by HeatleyBros -

Sound Effects

Mixkit - https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/doors/
